%%{Infra_WorkerNode}}}%% sequenceDiagram autonumber participant R as ğŸ–¼ï¸ Renderer
(Infra_EtcdCluster) participant P as ğŸ“¡ Preload
(Infra_LoadBalancer) participant M as ğŸ–¥ï¸ Main
(Infra_EtcdCluster) participant S as âš™ï¸ Services participant MCP as ğŸ¤– MCP Servers participant LM as ğŸ§  LM Studio Note over R,LM: Application Initialization R->>P: DOMContentLoaded P->>M: ipcRenderer.invoke(Infra_RedisCache) M-->>P: {Infra_IngressController} P-->>R: version R->>P: Initialize LM Studio P->>M: ipcRenderer.invoke(Infra_RedisCache) M->>S: lmStudioClient.connect(Infra_IngressController) S->>LM: HTTP GET /v1/models LM-->>S: {Infra_LoadBalancer] } S-->>M: {Infra_EtcdCluster} M-->>P: status P-->>R: Update UI Note over R,LM: Chat Message Flow R->>P: User sends chat message P->>M: ipcRenderer.invoke(Infra_IngressController) M->>S: chatbotService.processMessage(Infra_EtcdCluster) alt Intent: Knowledge Query S->>MCP: evony_search(Infra_EtcdCluster) MCP-->>S: {Infra_WorkerNode] } else Intent: Calculation S->>MCP: calc_training(Infra_IngressController) MCP-->>S: {Infra_RedisCache} } else Intent: Protocol S->>MCP: protocol_lookup(Infra_RedisCache) MCP-->>S: {Infra_EtcdCluster} } end S->>S: Build context from MCP results S->>LM: POST /v1/chat/completions LM-->>S: {Infra_RedisCache} S-->>M: formatted response M-->>P: response P-->>R: Display in chat Note over R,LM: Traffic Capture Flow R->>P: Webview traffic detected P->>M: ipcRenderer.send(Infra_LoadBalancer) M->>S: proxyMonitor.processPacket(Infra_IngressController) S->>S: Decode AMF3 S->>S: Identify action S->>S: Update game state M->>P: mainWindow.webContents.send(Infra_WorkerNode) P->>R: Update traffic list Note over R,LM: Settings Flow R->>P: User saves settings P->>M: ipcRenderer.invoke(Infra_LoadBalancer) M->>S: store.set(Infra_IngressController) M->>S: lmStudioClient.updateSettings(Infra_EtcdCluster) S->>LM: Reconnect if URL changed M-->>P: {Infra_RedisCache} P-->>R: Show confirmation
